name: Drift Delivery
description:
Hello, welcome to drift delivery, earn money by making deliveries in the town, the only catch: you can only drift.

This game is in constant development and is in early stages, therefore expect drastic changes to the game.

Please feel free to give feedback on what you like and don't like about the game.

Known Issues:

Caravan trailer can be a bit sticky.

Trailer spawning may cause unwanted cannon launches.

Sometimes a delivery will earn you infinity money, woo!

To reset game stats press F6.
